points.title-4: 4. RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS OF THE PARTIES
points.title-7: 7. VIOLATION OF THE TERMS OF THE USER AGREEMENT
points.title-10: 10. DETAILS AND ADDRESS OF THE CONTRACTOR
1: 1.1. This User Agreement (hereinafter – the Agreement) applies to the “Aqmaral” website located at aqmaral.com and to all related websites linked to aqmaral.com.
1.2. The “Aqmaral” website (hereinafter – the Website) is the property of Sole Proprietor “Myrza”.
1.3. This Agreement governs the relationship between the Administration of the “SanaUp” website (hereinafter – the Website Administration) and the User of this Website.
1.4. The Website Administration reserves the right to modify, add, or remove provisions of this Agreement at any time without notifying the User.
1.5. Continued use of the Website by the User means acceptance of the Agreement and any amendments made to this Agreement.
1.6. The User is personally responsible for checking this Agreement for changes.
2: 2.1. The following terms shall have the meanings indicated for the purposes of this Agreement:
2.1.1. “Aqmaral” — Products and Services located at the domain names aqmaral.com, operating via the Internet resource and its associated services.
2.1.2. Aqmaral — websites containing information about Products and Services, Sellers, allowing the selection, ordering, and/or purchase of Products and Services.
2.1.3. Aqmaral Website Administration — authorized employees managing the Website on behalf of Sole Proprietor “Myrza”.
2.1.4. Aqmaral Website User (hereinafter — User) — an individual who has access to the Website via the Internet and uses the Website.

2.1.5. Aqmaral Website Content (hereinafter — Content) — protected results of intellectual activity, including video materials, educational text materials, their titles, prefaces, annotations, articles, illustrations, covers, graphic, text, photographic, derivative, composite and other works, user interfaces, as well as the design, structure, appearance, general style and arrangement of this Content included in the Website, and other intellectual property objects, collectively and/or individually, contained on Aqmaral websites.
3: 3.1. The subject of this Agreement is to provide the User with access to the materials contained on the Website and the services offered.

3.1.1. The online store provides the User with the following services: — access to electronic content on a paid basis, with the right to purchase Products and Services on the sanaup.com websites; — access to information about the Service and information about purchasing the Service on a paid basis; — access to individual consultations on a paid basis in accordance with the rates posted on the Aqmaral Website.
3.1.2. This Agreement applies to all existing (currently functioning) Aqmaral services, as well as any subsequent modifications and newly appearing Aqmaral services.
3.2. Access to the public sections of the Aqmaral Website is provided free of charge.
3.3. This Agreement is a public offer. By accessing the Website, the User is deemed to have accepted this Agreement.
3.4. The use of the Website’s materials and services is governed by the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
4: 4.1. The Website Administration has the right to:
4.1.1. Change the rules for using the Website, as well as modify the content of the Website. Changes take effect upon publication of the new version of the Agreement on the Website.
4.1.2. Restrict access to the Website in case the User violates the terms of this Agreement.

4.1.3. Change the fee charged for providing access to the paid content of the Aqmaral website. The change in price will not apply to Users who have already paid for content before the price change, except in cases specifically stipulated by the Website Administration.
4.2. The User has the right to:
4.2.1. Access the paid part of the Website content after fulfilling the registration and payment requirements.
4.2.2. Use all services available on the Website, as well as purchase any Services offered on the Website.
4.2.3. Ask any questions related to Aqmaral services.
4.2.4. Use the Website exclusively for purposes and in the manner provided by the Agreement and not prohibited by the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
4.3. The User agrees to:
4.3.1. Provide, at the request of the Website Administration, additional information directly related to the services provided by this Website.
4.3.2. Respect the property and non-property rights of authors and other rights holders when using the Website.
4.3.3. Refrain from actions that may be regarded as disrupting the normal functioning of the Website.
4.3.4. Not distribute, using the Website, any confidential and legally protected information about individuals or legal entities.
4.3.5. Avoid any actions that may lead to a breach of confidentiality of information protected by the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
4.3.6. Not use the Website to distribute advertising information unless agreed upon with the Website Administration.
4.3.7. Not use the Aqmaral website services for the purpose of:

4.3.7.1. Uploading content that is illegal, infringes any third-party rights; promotes violence, cruelty, hatred and/or discrimination based on race, nationality, gender, religion, or social status; contains false information and/or insults toward specific persons, organizations, or authorities.
4.3.7.2. Encouraging unlawful activities and assisting persons whose actions aim to violate restrictions and prohibitions in force in the Republic of Kazakhstan.
4.3.7.3. Violating the rights of minors and/or causing them harm in any form.
4.3.7.4. Infringing on the rights of minorities.
4.3.7.5. Impersonating another person or a representative of an organization and/or community without sufficient rights, including employees of this online store.
4.3.7.6. Misleading about the properties and characteristics of any Service from the Aqmaral website catalog.
4.3.7.7. Making unfair comparisons of Services, as well as forming a negative attitude towards persons (not) using certain Services, or condemning such persons.
4.4. The User is prohibited from:
4.4.1. Using any devices, programs, procedures, algorithms, or methods, automatic devices, or equivalent manual processes to access, acquire, copy, or track the content of the Aqmaral Website;
4.4.2. Disrupting the proper functioning of the Website;
4.4.3. Bypassing the Website’s navigational structure to obtain or attempt to obtain any information, documents, or materials by any means not specifically provided by the Website’s services;
4.4.4. Gaining unauthorized access to the Website’s features, any other systems or networks related to the Website, as well as any services offered on the Website;
4.4.5. Violating the Website’s security or authentication systems or any network related to the Website.
4.4.6. Performing reverse lookups, tracking, or attempting to track any information about another Website User.

4.4.7. Using the Website and its Content for any purposes prohibited by the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan, as well as inciting any illegal activities or other activities that infringe the rights of the Aqmaral website or other persons.
5: 5.1. The Website and its Content are owned and managed by the Website Administration.
5.2. Website Content may not be copied, published, reproduced, transmitted, or distributed in any way, nor posted on the Internet without prior written consent from the Website Administration.
5.3. Website Content is protected by copyright law, trademark law, and other laws related to intellectual property, as well as laws on unfair competition.
5.4. Purchasing any Service offered on the Website requires creating a User account.
5.5. The User is personally responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information, including their password, as well as for all activities conducted under their account.
5.6. The User must immediately notify the Website Administration of any unauthorized use of their account or password, or any other breach of the security system.
5.7. The Website Administration has the right to unilaterally delete a User account if it has not been used for more than 24 consecutive calendar months without notifying the User.
5.8. This Agreement applies to all additional provisions and conditions for purchasing Goods and services provided on the Website.
5.9. Information posted on the Website should not be interpreted as amending this Agreement.

5.10. The Website Administration has the right to modify the list of services offered on the Website and/or the prices applicable to such Aqmaral Products and Services at any time without notifying the User.
6: 6.1. Any losses that the User may incur in the event of intentional or negligent violation of any provision of this Agreement, as well as due to unauthorized access to another User’s communications, will not be compensated by the Website Administration.
6.2. The Website Administration is not responsible for:
6.2.1. Delays or failures in the operation caused by force majeure events, as well as any malfunctions in telecommunications, computer, electrical, and related systems.
6.2.2. Actions of transfer systems, banks, payment systems, or delays related to their operation.
6.2.3. Proper functioning of the Website if the User does not have the necessary technical means to use it, and is not obligated to provide such means.
7: 7.1. The Website Administration has the right to disclose any information collected about the User if disclosure is necessary in connection with an investigation or complaint regarding improper use of the Website, or to identify the User who may violate or interfere with the rights of the Website Administration or other Website Users.

7.2. The Website Administration has the right to disclose any information about the User it deems necessary to comply with applicable laws or court decisions, to ensure compliance with the terms of this Agreement, or to protect the rights or safety of Users.
7.3. The Website Administration has the right to disclose information about the User if the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan require or allow such disclosure.

7.4. The Website Administration has the right, without prior notice to the User, to terminate and/or block access to the Website if the User has violated this Agreement or the terms contained in other documents governing the Website’s use, as well as in the event of the Website’s termination or due to a technical malfunction or problem.

7.5. The Website Administration is not responsible to the User or third parties for terminating access to the Website in case of violation by the User of any provision of this Agreement or any other document containing terms of Website use.
8: 8.1. In the event of any disagreements or disputes between the Parties to this Agreement, it is a mandatory condition to submit a claim (a written proposal for voluntary settlement of the dispute) before going to court.
8.2. The recipient of the claim must notify the claimant in writing of the results of the claim review within 30 calendar days from the date of receipt.
8.3. If it is impossible to resolve the dispute amicably, either Party may apply to the court to protect its rights granted by the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

8.4. Any lawsuit related to the terms of use of the Website must be filed within 10 working days after the grounds for the claim arise, except for the protection of copyrights for materials protected by law. Failure to comply with this clause results in the claim being barred by the statute of limitations.
9: 9.1. The Website Administration does not accept counter-proposals from the User regarding amendments to this User Agreement.
9.2. User reviews posted on the Website are not confidential and may be used by the Website Administration without restrictions.
10: Legal address: Z05X4T2, Republic of Kazakhstan,
Astana, Nura District, Abiken Bekturov Street, 4/1
